message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $2000000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1400000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1400000 is a significant discount, but I'm still looking for a better return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1800000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1800000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I understand that $1500000 is still a bit lower than my target, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1700000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident that it's a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $1700000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand that $1600000 is still a bit lower than my target, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1650000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident that it's a great deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $1650000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product, but that's as high as I can go. Please consider this my final offer.

I understand that you've made a final offer, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1600000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1650000 and $1600000. I'll sell the product to you for $1625000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go above $1600000. I'm willing to make one last concession and meet you at $1600000. This is my final offer.
